TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WritableChangedHandler(object o, WritableChangedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed WritableChangedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the WritableChangedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the WritableChangedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the WritableChangedHandler is removed from the event.
